path.style: stroke: rgb(0,0,0); stroke-width: 5; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-miterlimit: 4; fill: rgb(200,170,50); fill-opacity: 0.2; fill-rule: nonzero; opacity: 1;
stroke: rgb(0,0,0); stroke-width: 5; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-miterlimit: 4; fill: rgb(200,200,250); fill-opacity: 0.2; fill-rule: nonzero; opacity: 1;
stroke: rgb(0,0,0); stroke-width: 4; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-miterlimit: 4; fill: rgb(255,255,34); fill-opacity: 0.2; fill-rule: nonzero; opacity: 1;
